data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Use the flash to fill in shadows. If ____ subject ____ side-lighting ____ the ____ on ____ face ____ you ____ to ____ on ____, ____ the ____ to ____ the ____. BE SURE you're far enough away, or the whole picture will be blotted out!
data.partBlankContent: Use the flash to fill in shadows. If yo__ subject h__ side-lighting era____ the feat____ on i__ face th__ you wa__ to cap____ on fi__, u__ the fl___ to er___ the sha____. BE SURE you're far enough away, or the whole picture will be blotted out!
data.fullContent: Use the flash to fill in shadows. If your subject has side-lighting erasing the features on its face that you want to capture on film, use the flash to erase the shadows. BE SURE you're far enough away, or the whole picture will be blotted out!
data.answer: 使用闪光灯来填充阴影。如果你的拍摄对象有侧光擦去了你想拍摄的面部特征，用闪光灯擦去阴影。一定要走得足够远，否则整个画面就会被抹掉!
